description: IP Address of the request source.
name: IP_Address

description: OAPEN ID assigned to each title. This can be a number or a string.
name: Proprietary_Identifier

description: Total number of request for all months combined.
name: Reporting_Period_Total

description: Number of request for a specific month from a country. If a range of months is selected, there will be a column for each month.
name: MMM_YY
